Articles.Content:
Hey guys! As I'm sure some of you know from previous threads you may have seen I'm trying to grow my YouTube fan base. I am starting to like the idea of making video's like Nassault which I'm sure some of you may know.

My best work is this.

I say best work because I used a brand new video editor to do this and did not know all of its features which I still don't but am learning. Basically I'm wondering if I should keep doing things like this or start going into some of the music I've wrote and continue my KSP "will it survive" series.

Edited December 10, 2013 by 7499275
The video is well done (apart from lagginess), but please, I like having ear,s and the music puts me in danger of losing them!
Haha, noted will fix that on the next video I do like that if I do another one.
You should embed your video instead of forcing views on the youtube page.

You should embed your video instead of forcing views on the youtube page.

As you wish.
